message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it has the potential to be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $13,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $13,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
